name: Waiting
description: The Gate of Fixed Rhythms - Natural patterns and fixed rhythms that support life

channel.name: Rhythm
channel.description: The Channel of Rhythm - A Design of Being in the Flow

signal.script: Your body is asking for rhythm and consistency. What simple pattern can you establish today?
experiments: Sync activities to natural rhythms (light, hunger, energy)
Track your natural energy patterns for a week

friction.script: You're pushing against a rhythm that can't be rushed. What if the waiting itself is productive?
experiments: Study something that grows slowly (plant, skill, relationship)
Document what emerges during waiting periods

breakpoint.script: Your system is demanding surrender to its own timing. Recovery requires trust in biological rhythm.
experiments: Sleep when tired, eat when hungry for one week
Practice doing nothing for set periods
